title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally, with built-in model management and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting Node.js and browser environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models in LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, providing easy integration with Java applications and Spring Boot.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama API, enabling Ruby applications to use local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI tool for Ollama with additional features like model search and batch operations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models as GitHub Copilot alternative for code completion.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot integration for Ollama, allowing users to chat with local LLMs in Discord servers.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot for Ollama, enabling chat with local LLMs through Telegram messaging.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant integration for Ollama, bringing local LLM capabilities to home automation.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama in containerized environments.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Ollama model configurations and custom model definitions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri, providing native app experience.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware and utilities for building web applications with Ollama integration.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit components and apps for Ollama, enabling rapid prototyping of LLM-powered interfaces.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama, providing idiomatic Go bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama with async support and efficient memory usage for Rust applications.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client, providing TypeScript definitions and browser support.
